QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ValueSetIsDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Value specified is distance to surface.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: DistanceToSurface
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance vehicle is away from surface.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: FrontalOverlap
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Amount of overlap between images in the forward facing direction.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: SideOverlap
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Amount of overlap between images in the side facing direction.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: Campos
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Camera Auto Mount Pseudo Oblique Solution

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CamposSurvey2D
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: 2D surveys are optimized for area coverage, 3D surveys are better for model generation

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CamposPositions
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Number of positions to move the camera within the roll angle limits

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CamposMinInterval
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The minimum interval in which the camera is capable of taking subsequent pictures repeatedly. 0 to ignore.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CamposRollAngle
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The angle limits that the camera will be rolled to left and right of the neutral

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CamposPitchAngle
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The pitch angle that the camera will remain while in CAMPOS mode
